statements: UPDATE tourist_feedback SET destination_name = 'Paris', feedback_text = 'Amazing experience!', rating = 4.5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE tourist_feedback SET sustainability_rating = 3.8, date_submitted = '2022-09-15 08:00:00' WHERE destination_name = 'Tokyo';
UPDATE tourist_feedback SET rating = 4.5, sustainability_rating = 3.75 WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE tourist_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Wonderful experience at the beach!', date_submitted = '2022-05-31 15:30:00' WHERE destination_name = 'Beach Resort'
UPDATE tourist_feedback SET rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET travelers_impact = 8, sustainable_rating = 4 WHERE destination_id = 3;
UPDATE tourist_feedback SET rating = 4, submission_date = '2022-02-15', feedback_text = 'Excellent experience' WHERE feedback_id = 101;
UPDATE sustainability_practices SET travelers_impact = 80, community_engagement = 'Local community projects and clean-up initiatives', sustainable_rating = 5 WHERE destination_id = 201;
UPDATE tourist_reviews SET rating = 5 WHERE review_id = 12345;
UPDATE destinations SET sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE destination_name = 'Paris';
UPDATE tourist_reviews SET feedback = 'Excellent service! Will definitely visit again.', rating = 5 WHERE tourist_name = 'Alice' AND destination_name = 'Beach City';
UPDATE destinations SET sustainability_rating = 4, destination_name = 'Mountain Town' WHERE destination_id = 2;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = 101;
UPDATE tourist SET nationality = 'Spain' WHERE tourist_id = 201;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 101
UPDATE tourist SET nationality = 'French', age = 30 WHERE tourist_id = 201
UPDATE destinations SET sustainability_rating = 4.7 WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE destinations SET destination_name = 'New Destination Name', sustainability_rating = 4.5 WHERE destination_id = 1;
UPDATE feedback SET feedback_rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Excellent experience' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
